name: Click, Click & Click!
description:
You are a witch. You brew elemental potions. Your magic shop in the forest is in demand. It is necessary to maintain customer loyalty so that the store does not cease to exist.

In the game you have to show sleight of hand by pressing the left, right or center mouse button in succession. Each element has its own combination of numbers:
- fire is 012;
- water is 120;
- earth is 201.

To destroy the enemy, you need to understand what element he belongs to. Red is fire, Blue is water, Yellow is earth. After that, move the cursor over the enemy. The cursor turns red. At this moment, you must use a combination of numbers of the element. If you want to defeat a fiery opponent, you must use the water element by dialing 120.

Fire destroys earth, earth destroys water, water destroys fire ...

Good luck!
